speaker: President.
english: President. − The next item is the report ( A6-0155/2008 ) by Lasse Lehtinen, on behalf of the Committee on the Internal Market and Consumer Protection, on the EU Consumer Policy strategy 2007-2013 ( 2007/2189(INI) ).
original: President. − The next item is the report ( A6-0155/2008 ) by Lasse Lehtinen, on behalf of the Committee on the Internal Market and Consumer Protection, on the EU Consumer Policy strategy 2007-2013 ( 2007/2189(INI) ).
